# Big-Ideas-Final-Project
Team name: 

Members:

Datasets Used: https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/allegheny-county-air-quality/resource/4ab1e23f-3262-4bd3-adbf-f72f0119108b (Daily air quality measured in certain sites in Pittsburgh)

Overview: Determining the best Pittsburgh neighborhood based on the wellbeing of the citizens of that specific neighborhood.
